channel.title: Farcasting an NPC [HELP]
channel.description:
Base: Delta Problem: Sometimes, people just use range or mage and they farcast an NPC (avoiding from being attacked "safepotting"). They just move and the NPC doesn't move anymore so they attack it without being attacked. Errors(Compiling Errors): None. Other Information/Media(Pictures, etc):
Yeah, I'd like to know how to fix that safepotting on NPC. Like I'd need something so when they attack a monsters, it always follows you WHATEVER happends.
Thanks

item.title: Farcasting an NPC [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @I_Hope_I I Hope I
item.description:
@I_Hope_I wrote:

I think it’s something to do with the “GoodDistance” thing but I don’t know.

Read full topic

item.title: Farcasting an NPC [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

hmm… i dont know how to exactly fix this but im sure its simple maybe in action handler you could set it for each npc one by one to follow when attacked this would probably be a simple way but there are probably more convenient and less time consuming ways to do it.

Read full topic

Base: Delta
Problem: Sometimes, people just use range or mage and they farcast an NPC (avoiding from being attacked “safepotting”). They just move and the NPC doesn’t move anymore so they attack it without being attacked.
